Rich Metadata Article

June 15, 2025

By Jane Doe

This article has comprehensive metadata including Open Graph tags, JSON-LD structured data, standard meta tags, a canonical URL, and a time element. It serves as a test fixture for the metadata extractor.

The metadata extractor should find the title, author, publication date, description, keywords, canonical URL, OG image, OG type, and site name from the various sources in the head element.

Multiple metadata sources may provide conflicting values for the same field. The extractor should follow the priority order defined in the spec when resolving conflicts between OG tags, JSON-LD, and standard meta tags.

This final paragraph ensures enough content length for Readability to confidently identify the article region.
